languages.text: {n}Маражай склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Скажи мне, что больше прочего взволнует тебя, если я предложу тебе это? Быть может, тысячи прикосновений, несущие ласку и боль? Или же страсть, что способна удушить тебя до смерти? Или, быть может, совершенный, оглушительный экстаз, рожденный на миллиардах кончиков? Это твой выбор".

{n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Скажи мне, что больше прочего взволнует тебя, если я предложу тебе это? Быть может, тысячи прикосновений, несущие ласку и боль? Или же страсть, что способна удушить тебя до смерти? Или, быть может, совершенный, оглушительный экстаз, рожденный на миллиардах кончиков? Это твой выбор".

Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

{n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

{n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋把头歪向一旁。{/n}“告诉我，怎样的感觉能让你最兴奋呢？是成千上万次既温柔、又痛苦的爱抚？是足以令生命窒息的激情？还是由亿万个细小的峰峦带来的至高狂喜？选择权在你手中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋把头歪向一旁。{/n}“告诉我，怎样的感觉能让你最兴奋呢？是成千上万次既温柔、又痛苦的爱抚？是足以令生命窒息的激情？还是由亿万个细小的峰峦带来的至高狂喜？选择权在你手中。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、首をコテンと傾けた。{/n}「言え、どのプレゼントが一番興奮した？甘くて痛い何千回もの刺激？命賭けで窒息する情熱？それとも、何十億もの小さな針に溺れる、完璧に近い粉砕のエクスタシー？選ぶ権利はお前にある」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、首をコテンと傾けた。{/n}「言え、どのプレゼントが一番興奮した？甘くて痛い何千回もの刺激？命賭けで窒息する情熱？それとも、何十億もの小さな針に溺れる、完璧に近い粉砕のエクスタシー？選ぶ権利はお前にある」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza.{/n} «Dime, ¿qué ofrenda te entusiasmaría más? ¿Miles de caricias que te inflijan ternura y dolor? ¿Una pasión tan intensa que podría asfixiarte? ¿O tal vez un éxtasis perfecto y abrumador, causado por miles de millones de fugaces clímax? La elección es tuya».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza.{/n} «Dime, ¿qué ofrenda te entusiasmaría más? ¿Miles de caricias que te inflijan ternura y dolor? ¿Una pasión tan intensa que podría asfixiarte? ¿O tal vez un éxtasis perfecto y abrumador, causado por miles de millones de fugaces clímax? La elección es tuya».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Dites-moi, quelle offrande vous ferait le plus plaisir ? Des milliers de caresses prodiguant autant de tendresse que de souffrance ? Une étreinte passionnée capable de vous asphyxier jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive ? Ou peut-être l'extase accablante procurée par des millions d'aiguillons répétés à l'infini ? À vous de choisir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Dites-moi, quelle offrande vous ferait le plus plaisir ? Des milliers de caresses prodiguant autant de tendresse que de souffrance ? Une étreinte passionnée capable de vous asphyxier jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive ? Ou peut-être l'extase accablante procurée par des millions d'aiguillons répétés à l'infini ? À vous de choisir. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Erzählt mir, welches meiner Angebote gefällt Euch am besten? Tausende von Berührungen, die Euch Zärtlichkeit und Schmerz schenken? Leidenschaft, die das Leben in Euch zum Ersticken bringt? Oder vielleicht perfekte, betäubende Ekstase, die durch Milliarden von winzigen Höhepunkten erreicht wird? Ihr entscheidet."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Erzählt mir, welches meiner Angebote gefällt Euch am besten? Tausende von Berührungen, die Euch Zärtlichkeit und Schmerz schenken? Leidenschaft, die das Leben in Euch zum Ersticken bringt? Oder vielleicht perfekte, betäubende Ekstase, die durch Milliarden von winzigen Höhepunkten erreicht wird? Ihr entscheidet."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kafasını yana eğiyor.{/n} "Söyle bana, seni en çok hangi hediye heyecanlandırır? Şefkat ve acı bahşeden binlerce dokunuş mu? Hayatında tozu dumana katacak denli güçlü bir tutku mu? Yoksa milyarlarca küçük iğne ucunun vereceği o mükemmel, dehşet uyandıran haz mı? Seçim senin."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Tell me, which offering would excite you most of all? Thousands of touches that bestow tenderness and pain? Passion capable of smothering the life out of you? Or perhaps perfect, shattering ecstasy brought by billions of tiny peaks? The choice is yours."
